pages.title: The Monstrosity
pages.text: $(italic)Something is lurking down there. You knew it!$()$(br)A cruel monstrosity watching your every step. Just waiting for the right time to strike.$(br)Watch out not getting shredded into pieces and devoured. What a nice time to be alive.

pages.title: Loss?
pages.text: This being is powerful. Very powerful. Whatever it may be, it's not a good idea to face this thing unprepared.
